title: Large-Scale Connected Learning Design for Adolescent Writer Identity Exploration

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of adolescent developmental stages, basic experience in writing instruction, and proficiency in digital platform utilization
context.additional_context: A program for in-service science teachers to enhance their ability to guide adolescent writing, combining smartphone-based online activities and offline workshops.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the identity formation process of adolescent writers within a cultural context.
Learners can promote creative writing activities for adolescents by applying connected learning design.
Learners can observe changes in power structures in digital environments (blogs) and reflect them in educational strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
